document.full_text: the taliban released a video on sunday of a canadian man captured this year in a volatile province of central afghanistan and said he would be put on trial for spying unless canada's government accepted unspecified demands for his release.
document.title: afghan taliban release video of captured canadian
lines_and_colors: the taliban released a video on sunday of a canadian man captured this year in a volatile province of central afghanistan and said he would be put on trial for spying unless canada's government accepted unspecified demands for his release.
